original_title: 引っ越しを終えて汗だくになったお隣さんと抱き合ったのはダンボール箱しかない生活感ゼロの部屋の中
overview: When I got off the elevator, I happened to meet an older sister. She just moved in today and put a lot of luggage in front of the entrance, so I helped her without any ulterior motives, but the neighbor who carried heavy luggage in rough clothes got her skin and hair wet and her clothes stained with sweat. is spreading. I was so excited that I had just moved my body to see such a figure.
title: I Embraced My Neighbor Who Was Sweating After Moving In A Room With Only A Cardboard Box And A Zero Life
